pages.text:
Book Tee Times Course We are an 18-hole, par 72 golf course that cannot be missed! Windy Harbor Golf Club is an 18-hole, par 72 golf course located on Naval Station Mayport, which includes a driving range and practice green. The clubhouse features a Pro Shop, men’s and women’s locker room, Bogey’s Restaurant, and The Grove Conference Center. Golf instruction is available for adults and children. This program is available to all MWR patrons and MWR Card holders. BASE ACCESS IS NEEDED TO PLAY. Golfers who do not have base access, will need to have a MWR Card play at Windy Harbor Golf Club on Naval Station Mayport. This applies to all civilians needing access who are 10 years and older. Apply for the MWR Card at NavyMWRMayport.com/MWRCard . People with base access, including active duty, retirees, reservists, DoD employees and their dependents, do not need a MWR Card to play. People without proper identification, like a MWR Card or military affiliated ID, will be turned away at the gate prior to arriving at Windy Harbor Golf Club. Traffic at the gate to Naval Station Mayport can be hectic, it is recommended you arrive at least 30-45 minutes prior to your tee time. Thank you for playing at Windy Harbor Golf Club! Visit Us Windy Harbor Golf Club 1981 Maine Street Jacksonville , Florida 32228 Call Us Phone: 904-270-5380 Email Us Email: barbara.j.harris2.naf@us.navy.mil

Book Tee Times MWR Card Receive special offers and opportunities with the MWR Card! The MWR Card enables civilians to participate in MWR Mayport programs like Windy Harbor Golf Club (see all programs below). Download the application and send completed forms to nsmypt_mwr_mail@navy.mil . Once received, MWR Mayport will contact you to schedule an appointment to receive your card. Appointments are usually scheduled within 2-4 weeks . On your appointment day you will need to bring two (2) forms of ID (accepted forms: state issued driver’s license, social security card, United States passport, voter’s registration card, birth certificate). All applicants must be US Citizens. Appointments take about 30 minutes. Everyone over the age of 10 needs a MWR Card to be on the course. MWR Cards are valid immediately after they are issued and expire in 12 months. MWR programs that participate in the MWR Card: · Windy Harbor Golf Club · Pinz Bowling Center · Beachside Bingo · Foc’sle Lounge at the CPO Club (all hands lunches) · Bogey’s Restaurant at Windy Harbor Golf Club · Loggerheads Pub in the Beacon · Ocean Breeze Conference and Catering Center · Spinz hand crafted food · Seaglass Wine Bar MWR Card Application Download MWR Card Receive special offers and opportunities with the MWR Card!
